questions.question_text: How can multiple service catalogs be made available on the Customer Service Portal?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is Correct

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Multiple catalogs can be added to the Customer Service Portal and to the Consumer Service Portal. A catalog can be added by navigating to Service Portal > Portals and add it to its Service Catalogs list.
A is correct pg 286 Fundamentals ebook

choices.A: Include them in the list of service catalogs on the Customer Service Portal record
choices.D: Create user criteria for each of the applicable service catalogs
choices.B: Add them to the list of service catalogs in the Customer Service Portal header widget options
choices.C: Only the Customer Service service catalog can be used on the Customer Service Portal

questions.question_text: Now Create provides a prescriptive methodology, leading practices, and accelerators to help with ServiceNow implementations and upgrades. How many sequential project phases and exit gates are there in the Now Create Methodology?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Five is correct.

E-book see 223. https://evantage.gilmoreglobal.com/reader/books/SN-CSMI-T010-PG-E/pageid/222

Selected Answer: B
B is Correct.
Initiate: Understand the business objectives; establish program
governance; establish the project team; formally kick-off the project 
Plan: Conduct process, platform, and integration workshops; define,
review and prioritize the product backlog; release
planning; finalize the project timeline; document the test
strategy; setup the environment
Execute: Run agile scrum cycles; define support processes and
hypercare approach; execute communications and awareness
roadshows; plan for system and user acceptance testing
Deliver: System testing and user acceptance testing; go-live
planning; operational readiness; training; go-live
Close: Operational handover; hypercare support; lessons learned;
measure value and champion success; formally close the project

Selected Answer: BD
- Auto assessment business rule.
- Update case entitlement on Close.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/reference/r_BRIWCustomerService.html

Selected Answer: BD
BD Is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/reference/r_BRIWCustomerService.html

questions.question_text: Which Business Rules are part of the Customer Service Management baseline configuration? (Choose two.)
From which one of the following can an agent create a CSM Case:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

Selected Answer: C
Explanation: Anagent can create a CSM case from any of the following source:
 - A customer service portal
 - A customer service dashboard
 - A customer service record producer
 - A customer service email
 - A customer service chat1

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/sandiego-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/customer-service-case-types.html

questions.question_text: Using the out-of-the-box major issue management process flow, a consumer service agent proposes an existing case in the Open state as a major case candidate. The major case candidate has a consumer defined and is approved by the customer service manager What happens to the major case candidate?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Approves the current major case candidate as a major case.
Upon approval:
If the candidate case was proposed from an existing case, a major case is created and the candidate case becomes a child case of that major case.
If the candidate case was created directly, the candidate case becomes the major case.

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.
Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/major-candidate-child-case-types.html
"If the major case candidate was promoted from an existing case, a major case is created and the candidate case becomes a child case of that parent."

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
Explanation: "These cases are added to the Child Cases related list on the major case form."

source: https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/tokyo-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/major-candidate-child-case-types.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.
If the major case candidate was promoted from an existing case, a major case is created and the candidate case becomes a child case of that parent.

Selected Answer: A
A IS CORRECT
 Approved candidate cases become major cases, which you can use to manage issues to resolution. Child cases are created for customers impacted by an issue and are associated with a major case.

choices.D: The major case candidate is closed and a new major case is created
choices.C: The major case candidate requires an approval from the major issue manager
choices.A: The major case candidate becomes a major case
choices.B: A new major case is created and the major case candidate is added as a child to the major case
